rule.name: CTMS_SiteActivityDetail_Section
rule.description: Takes a CTMS_SitePaymentActivitiesView cdt and returns a section with the full Site Payment Activities Detail data
rule.definition: =#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Activity", firstColumnContents: { /*a!textField(*/ /* label: "Type",*/ /* labelPosition: "ADJACENT",*/ /* value: ri!activitiesDetail.paymentType,*/ /* readOnly: true*/ /*),*/ /*a!textField(*/ /* label: "Visit Name",*/ /* labelPosition: "ADJACENT",*/ /* value: ri!activitiesDetail.protocolsNumber,*/ /* readOnly: true*/ /*),*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Activity", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.activity, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Activity Type", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.activityType, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Description", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.activityDescripiton, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Screening ID", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.screeningId, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Planned Start Date", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.plannedStartDate, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Start Date", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.startDate, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Planned Completed Date", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.planCompletedDate, readOnly: true ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Completed", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.completed, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Completed Date", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.completedDate, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Status", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.status, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Payment", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.payment, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Standard Amount", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.standardAmount, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Deviation Amount", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.deviationAmount, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Actual Amount", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!activitiesDetail.actualAmount, readOnly: true ) }, isCollapsible: true )
